description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with ST LEONARD S SOCIETY HAMILTON. The average
  contract duration was 2.47 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.0M.
  The longest contract was 4 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $5.3M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.0M'
